title: StockHedges
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Macy's employee who hid $151 million in delivery expenses was trying to mask initial mistake, sources say
items.description: The department store operator slightly raised its full-year forecast, while still projecting a sales decline.

items.title: Adobe shares suffer steepest drop in over two years on disappointing revenue guidance
items.description: Adobe shares tumbled after the software vendor issued revenue guidance that fell short of analysts' estimates.

items.title: Costco beats on earnings as e-commerce sales jump
items.description: Costco drew stronger online sales and higher traffic, as shoppers bought jewelry, luggage and more.

items.title: Costco quarter signals record stock run is not done yet. Here's our new price target
items.description: With gross margins and paid memberships trending higher, this rally to fresh highs can continue.

items.title: Natural Gas Prices Fall Amid Mild Temperatures
items.description: Warm U.S. weather drove down natural gas prices, despite some expectation of lower temperatures in January providing a respite.

items.title: AI chipmaker Broadcom shares soar 17% despite mixed quarterly results — here's why
items.description: We're increasing our price target on the stock after a slew of positive AI updates.

items.title: U.S. Stocks Fall Ahead of Fed Meeting
items.description: Major U.S. stock indexes fell as the Federal Reserve was due to begin its two-day rate-setting meeting.

items.title: Food Fight With Kroger Spells Trouble for Albertsons
items.description: Albertsons faces daunting challenges as a stand-alone company.
